item.description:
+++ date = “2017-03-12T12:11:51+08:00” title = “intro”

+++

Installing ebook-convert

OS X Download the Calibre Application. After moving the calibre.app to your Applications folder create a symbolic link to the ebook-convert tool:

$ sudo ln -s ~/Applications/calibre.app/Contents/MacOS/ebook-convert /usr/local/bin
